project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to build a network for MSM, gays and lesbians in Lesotho as the entry point for the delivery of targeted HIV-related services. It also seeks to undertake a size estimation and rapid assessment and response on MSM.

outputs.output_descr:
The project purpose is to support the establishment of a community network in Lesotho.  The project intends to provide capacity development support for the emerging network.  It also aims to support the development of interventions to build individual and community self-esteem, improve public awareness and understanding, and develop targeted interventions on HIV and AIDS tailored specifically to the needs of this group.

This project also seeks to undertake a size estimation and rapid assessment and response of men who have sex with men. The objective of this assessment is produce an estimation of the size of the MSM population in Lesotho together with a rapid assessment and response to MSM with the aim to catalyze an evidence informed HIV prevention programmes for MSM in Lesotho.
